channel.title: DXC Technology Company on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in DXC Technology Company on FinanClub

item.title: 0736 DXC
item.description: score:736 Chances: DXC Technology’s Q1 earnings decline is partially offset by a lower share count, which may positively impact its bottom line in future quarters. DXC Technology has announced a new multi-year agreement with AT&T to provide end-to-end support for a portion of its IT infrastructure operations, which may lead to potential growth opportunities.
